title: Question 14
prompt: Ann rescued a kitten from a local shelter. She named the kitten Elsa and bought her a shiny, green collar.  ___________________.  Elsa loved sitting on Ann's lap and playing with her new scratching post.
description: Read the paragraph.  Then choose the sentence that best fills the blank in the paragraph.
feedback: This paragraph tells a story in chronological order about Ann and her new kitten. The sentence “Elsa warmed up quickly to Ann” is the best choice to fill in the blank. It explains what happened after Ann named the kitten and bought her a collar. As a consequence of warming up to Ann, Elsa enjoyed sitting on Ann’s lap. The other answer choices don’t make logical sense at this point in the story. Ann has already gotten a cat, so she’s not still thinking about it. She’s also already contacted a local shelter. Elsa was also dropped off at the shelter before this point in the story.
